title:
Second order regularity for solutions to anisotropic degenerate elliptic
  equations
authors: Daniel Baratta, Luigi Muglia, Domenico Vuono
abstract:
We consider solutions to degenerate anisotropic elliptic equations in order
to study their regularity. In particular we establish second-order estimates
and enclose regularity results for the stress field. All our results are new
even in the euclidean case.
